name: 0 - Intro
_source: speak;Emma; Why do people who do nothing but kill,{w} torture, and steal think they're doing the right thing?
speak;Caroline; The world is just full of bad people.{w} You can't talk or reason with them.{w} Some of us are just{tgm}...{tgm}born bad.
speak;Emma; Nobody is born evil!{w} Nobody is born a killer!
speak;Caroline; Does it make any difference how they wre born when it's you or them?
speak;Caroline; You didn't seem to care about those bandits when you{tgm}...{tgm}{w} promised to exterminate them, right?
speak;Caroline; I'm{tgm}...{tgm}going to go help finish the tents.{w} Could you help too?
speak;Emma; I just{tgm}...{tgm}need some time to think.
speak;Emma; I can't believe she would say that{tgm}...{tgm}{w} People can't be naturally bad.{w} Everyone can help.{w} Everyone can{tgm}...
speak;Young Emily; Sis, look, a boar!{w} You got your bow ready?
speak;Young Emma; I'm scared, Emily{tgm}...{w} The boar looks dangerous!{w} I got magic, so why can't I just set it on fire?
speak;Young Emily; Emma, your magic goes out of control when you get scared, remember?{w} So learning how to hunt without magic is the best thing for you.
speak;Young Emma; But that lady in our village was teaching me how to control it!{w} I think I can do it!
speak;Young Emily; You mean that lady that just took out the boar for us?
speak;Young Emily; Hmph. Looks like you got our boar for us!

speak;Selena; Oh, this is <bconvo>your</> boar, now, is it?{w}{c:expression;Selena;NoSmile} I'm sorry for stealing it from you, though.{w} Emma, how was my teaching?{w} Did you learn to control your magic better?
speak;Young Emma; I still want to learn as much from you as possible, Miss Selena!{w} When we get back, can you give me another lesson?
speak;Selena; Sure thing, kiddo!{w}{c:expression;Selena;NoSmile} Wait, I hear something{tgm}...
speak;Young Emily; Emma!!!{w}{c:mirror_portrait;Young Emily} She's knocked out, Selena!
speak;Selena; Emily, take your sister back to the village! It's not safe here.
speak;Young Emily; Emma, don't you worry.{w} I'm here for you{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Lily will patch you up.
speak;Emma; What{tgm}...{tgm} What was that{tgm}...{tgm}?{w} It felt like a memory, but{tgm}...{tgm}{w} I don't remember that happening{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Maybe I can ask Emily about it later{tgm}...
speak;Caroline; Emma, are you alright?{w} We're still waiting on you to help with the tents!
speak;Emma; Mom, did you see that man who just bumped into me?
speak;Caroline; No, I didn't see any man.{w} It just looked like you were deep in thought.
speak;Emma; Maybe I'm just not right in the head right now{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Mom, do you remember a magenta- haired woman back at the village?
speak;Caroline; She only visited the village a handful of times,{w} but you and your sister would've been pretty young.{w} Who told you about her?
speak;Emma; I saw her in the village that we defended{tgm}...{tgm}{w} When we spoke, I remembered seeing her once before{tgm}...
speak;Caroline; Wait, we haven't finished setting up the tents yet!
speak;Emma; Right, sorry Mom, let's finish that up and head to the mountaintops in the morning.
speak;Caroline; Right, we should hurry up so we can get some sleep.
speak;Caroline; Selena was in that village...?;no_talk
speak;Emma; Huh? Then how do I remember so vividly{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Ugh, my head hurts just thinking about it.{w} Anyway, let's finish with those tents and head to the mountaintops in the morning.
speak;Caroline; Right, we should hurry up so we can get some sleep.
speak;Caroline;How in the world does she remember Selena...?;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
